title: purpose of giving further effect to Commission Regulation (EEC) No. 3440/84
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Sea-Fisheries (Technical
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Sea-Fisheries (Technical 

Measures) (Amendment) Regulations 2023.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited sea-fisheries (technical measures) (amendment) regulation 2023

title: purpose of giving further effect to Commission Regulation (EEC) No. 3440/84
heading: 2. The Sea-Fisheries (Technical Measures) Regulations 2019 (S.I. No. 520
text_raw:
2. The Sea-Fisheries (Technical Measures) Regulations 2019 (S.I. No. 520 
of 2019) are amended in Regulation 2(1) by the insertion after “23 August 
2021” in the definition of “Council Regulation” (as amended by the SeaFisheries (Technical Measures) (Amendment) Regulations 2022 (S.I. No. 223 
of 2022)) of the following: “, Commission Delegated Regulation (EU) 
2022/2588 of 20 October 2022 and Commission Delegated Regulation (EU) 
2023/56 of 19 July 2022”. 

1 OJ L 318, 7.12.1984, p. 23 
2 OJ L 90, 2.4.1987, p. 29 
3 OJ L 203, 15.7.1989, p. 21 
4 OJ L 46, 16.2.2007, p. 9 
5 OJ L 198, 25.7.2019, p. 105 
6 OJ L 338, 30.12.2022, p.44 
7 OJ L 5, 6.1.2023, p. 1 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 31st January, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 3. The Sea-Fisheries (Technical Measures) (Amendment) Regulations 

2022 (S.I. No. 223 of 2022) are revoked. 

[13] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

26 January, 2023. 

CHARLIE MCCONALOGUE, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [13]

title: purpose of giving further effect to Commission Regulation (EEC) No. 3440/84
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This instrument amends the Sea-Fisheries (Technical Measures) Regulations 
2019 (S.I. No. 520 of 2019) to give effect to (a) Commission Delegated 
Regulation (EU) 2022/2588 of 20 October 2022 as regards technical measures 
for demersal and pelagic fisheries in the Celtic Sea, the Irish Sea and West of 
Scotland and (b) Commission Delegated Regulation (EU) 2023/56 as regards 
specific technical measures for red seabream (Pagellus bogaraveo) in ICES 
subareas 6 to 8. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [13] 5
